name: Cons&Truct
description:
Description :

Help Cons & Truct to build the house of their dream in the given time.
But be careful not to go too fast, some bricks can not be assembled and will be automatically destroyed causing you to lose valuable seconds.

Cons & Truct is a cooperation game where players must communicate to assemble the maximum of bricks in the minimum of time.

Commands :

P1
Build : RB / E
Throw : LB / A
P2
Build : LB / Left arrow
Throw : RB / Right arrow
